ExternalData.Titlesect: Constitution of the International Refugee Organization*

TreatyNote.Text: The Constitution was approved by the General Assembly of the United Nations in resolution 62 (I) of 15 December 1946. Resolution No. 108, adopted by the General Council of the International Refugee Organization at its 101st meeting on 15 February 1952, provided for the liquidation of the Organization.

Expiration.Label: EXPIRATION
Expiration.Labeltext: Treaties which have been terminated are denoted by an asterisk. For those treaties, the participant tables have been removed.
